Piratini Most Excellent

Yesterday I arrived in this city under the order of the General-in-Chief, which was addressed to me by General Bento Gonçalves and served by Major Glória. Yesterday itself I wished to present myself to Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

To your compatriot, subject, and friend Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
